unnormalised: Payment gateways, the real MVPs of e-commerce, yaar! Without them, selling my wife Priya's amazing biryani online would be a nightmare. Imagine, everyone sending me Rs. 500 via post office! *shudders*. It's like navigating Mumbai traffic during Diwali – chaotic! Thank God for these guys. Hope they're enjoying Onam too! May your servers never crash, you digital deities!
